verses.text: \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* heads \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w This|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w order|strong="H6680"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w When|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* takes \w an|strong="H2088"\w* \w oath|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* gives \w an|strong="H2088"\w* undertaking having \w the|strong="H0559"\w* force \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w an|strong="H2088"\w* \w oath|strong="H1697"\w*, let \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* go \w back|strong="H0413"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w but|strong="H1696"\w* let \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w do|strong="H6680"\w* \w whatever|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6680"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* woman, \w being|strong="H5315"\w* young \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w authority|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w takes|strong="H7650"\w* \w an|strong="H7650"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* gives \w an|strong="H7650"\w* undertaking;

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, hearing \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w* oath \w or|strong="H0001"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* undertaking \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given, says nothing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H0802"\w*, \w then|strong="H3068"\w* all \w her|strong="H0802"\w* oaths \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H0802"\w* undertaking \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0001"\w* force.

\w But|strong="H8085"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0001"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, makes \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w take|strong="H6965"\w* back \w her|strong="H3605"\w* word, \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oaths \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* undertakings \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* force; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* forgiveness \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* oath \w was|strong="H0834"\w* broken \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* married \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* husband \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* oath \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* undertaking \w given|strong="H8085"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* thought;

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, hearing \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, says \w nothing|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* oaths \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* undertakings \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* force.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, makes \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w take|strong="H6965"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* back, \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* oath \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0631"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* undertaking \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* without thought \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* no force \w or|strong="H8085"\w* \w effect|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord's forgiveness.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w an|strong="H0376"\w* oath \w made|strong="H0631"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* widow \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H0518"\w* longer married \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* undertaking \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H8085"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* force.

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0631"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* oath \w while|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w under|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w authority|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* husband,

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, hearing \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, said \w nothing|strong="H0518"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w did|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w put|strong="H0631"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* stop \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*, \w then|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w oaths|strong="H7621"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* undertaking \w she|strong="H0518"\w* gave \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0376"\w* force.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w made|strong="H0631"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* force \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w effect|strong="H6965"\w*, \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w whatever|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* oaths \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* undertaking \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* force: \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H0631"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w effect|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord's forgiveness.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* oath, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* undertaking which \w she|strong="H0518"\w* gives, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8085"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* pleasure, \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* supported \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* days \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* says \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*, \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* giving \w the|strong="H3605"\w* support \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* authority \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w oaths|strong="H7621"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* undertakings, \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w at|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* time \w of|strong="H0376"\w* hearing \w them|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* said \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w some|strong="H0376"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* makes \w them|strong="H0413"\w* without force, \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* wrongdoing.

These \w are|strong="H5771"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* laws which \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w gave|strong="H8085"\w* Moses \w in|strong="H8085"\w* relation \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* man \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* wife, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* father \w and|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* young daughter who \w is|strong="H5771"\w* under \w his|strong="H5375"\w* authority.
